Racliffs [sic – should be Radcliff's] Notes

•	Jared has become more difficult to work with. Very demanding and high expectations of
people is making it hard for people to engage with him. The staff find it better to stay out of the
weeds and away from him altogether. This is making it hard for us to get things done. He will
blame others.

•	Jared has become more TOXIC inside the organization. He has become over the top and very
abrasive, I have talked to Jared about these issues and it is clear he is not going to change.

•	The team is stressed to the limit, and beyond. There is little respect of time. The environment
is to work, work, work. This can be an unhealthy extreme.

•. Jared is difficult to get hold of.
